1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Shorthand types and functions.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Shorthand
6 ( -- * Derived types
7   Pair, Twin,
8
9   -- * Functions
10   ordEq, compareOn,
11   int, integer,
12   nothing,
13 ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type as O
16
17
18-- ============================================  Types
19
20-- | Pair of /a/ and /b/.
21type Pair a b = (a, b)
22
23-- | Pair of /a/ and /a/.
24type Twin a = (a, a)
25
26
27-- ============================================  Function
28
29-- | Test equality using 'Ord' method.
30--   This function can be used for implementing 'Eq' instance.
31--
32--   > instance Eq X where
33--   >   (==) = ordEq
34--
35ordEq :: (Ord a) => a -> a -> Bool
36ordEq x y = (x `compare` y) == EQ
37
38-- | @compareOn@ /f/ /x/ /y/ comapres /f x/ and /f y/
39--   instead of /x/ and /y/.
40--
41--   >>> compareOn length "foo" "bar"
42--   EQ
43--
44compareOn :: (Ord b) => (a -> b) -> a -> a -> Ordering
45compareOn f x y = f x `compare` f y
46
47-- | 'Int' shorthand.
48--
49--   >>> int 12
50--   12
51--
52--   This is same as:
53--
54--   >>> 12 :: Int
55--   12
56--
57{-# INLINE int #-}
58int :: O.Map Int
59int = id
60
61-- | 'Integer' shorthand.
62--
63--   >>> integer 12
64--   12
65--
66--   This is same as:
67--
68--   >>> 12 :: Integer
69--   12
70--
71{-# INLINE integer #-}
72integer :: O.Map Integer
73integer = id
74
75-- | Function which always returns 'Nothing'.
76--
77--   >>> nothing True :: Maybe String
78--   Nothing
79--
80nothing :: a -> Maybe b
81nothing _ = Nothing
